title: John Lee Hooker - Live At The Cafe Au Go-Go (And Soledad Prison)
description:
a legendary performance with a legendary lineup


The 1996 CD reissue contains the entirety of Hooker's 1966 Cafe Au Go-Go set, and adds five bonus tracks from his 1972 album, Live at Soledad Prison.
